        public static Class<?> getClass(String className,
                ClassLoader classloader)
        Loads the class with the provided classloader.
        Parameters:
        className - The full-name of the class to load
        classloader - The classloader to use for classloading
        Returns:
        The class object that represents the specified class or null if class loading failed.

      • deleteFolderRec

        public static void deleteFolderRec(File dir)
        Deletes recursively specified folder or file. If folder cannot be deleted, its deletion is postponed to the JavaMV shutdown.
        Parameters:
        dir - The folder to delete recursively.
